history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving directions
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?For example, you can say I'm going to Squirrel Hill
USER I'm going to Murray and Forbes.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to forbes avenue and murray avenue?
USER Actually, I want to go to CMU.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to carnegie mellon university?
USER exactly
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER I'm leaving in from Ellsworth and Negley.
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from ellsworth avenue and south negley avenue?
USER That's correct.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER At 8 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 08:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 5 minutes.<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head southeast on south Negley avenue toward Elmer St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Dunmoyle St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER start over
TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
